summary: This is an email chain from July 1, 2020, forwarding information about Ghislaine Maxwell's siblings, including their names, dates of birth, and residence status. It appears to be internal FBI or law enforcement communication regarding background information on Maxwell's family.

keyFacts: The document lists eight siblings of Ghislaine Maxwell: Christine, Isabel, Karine (deceased, DOB 1947), Ann (Anne) Maxwell (also Anne Holve, married to Lawrence Holve), Kevin, Michael (deceased, DOB 1946), Ian, and Philip.
Several siblings have no identified residence in the US: Ann (Anne) Maxwell, Kevin Maxwell, Ian Maxwell, and Philip Maxwell.
Philip Maxwell is noted as having no travel history.
The email is dated July 1, 2020, indicating ongoing investigation or background work on Ghislaine Maxwell around the time of her arrest (July 2020).
The correspondence is internal, sent to FBI personnel Amanda N. Young in New York, suggesting law enforcement interest in Maxwell's family connections.
